alert.note: Alert for Lamar; Pike; Spalding (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 10:28PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Spalding, southeastern Fayette, northern Pike and northern Lamar Counties through 1100 PM EDT... At 1028 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Hollonville, or 9 miles northwest of Zebulon, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Griffin, Zebulon, Milner, Brooks, Williamson, Orchard Hill, East Griffin, Highland Mills, Towalaga, Experiment, Walker Mill, Vaughn, Hollonville, Chappel Mill, Rover, Liberty Hill, Digbey, Zetella and Hilltop. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
